alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 5:29PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Prowers, eastern Kiowa and northeastern Bent Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 529 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sheridan Lake, or 27 miles northeast of Lamar, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wiley, Sheridan Lake, Neeoshe Reservoir, McClave, Towner, Brandon, Neegronda Reservoir and Queens Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County
